name: Satan Separation
description:
DESRICPTION:

Satan Separation is an arcade game about exorcism. The game looks like its from the 80’s as you can see from the pixel art and the old MSDOS colour palette. You play as an angel keeping demons out of humans for as long as you can while facing multiple different challenges.

----

CONTROLS:

Move - Left/Right arrow key

Flap wings - Spacebar

Shoot - Up arrow key
